pages.title: Midas Gold
pages.text: Midas Gold, a substance created by a touch of a mythic creature, this substance has forbidden properties and can be only find in the underworld.
Can be folded in the $(item)Smithing Table$() with $(item)Midas Gold Block$() to increase damage
this sword has a forgotten whereabouts, but when found, its damage can be increased by folding them with $(item)Midas Gold Blocks$() in the $(item)Smithing Table
